play:add-module-app-resources

Full name:

com.google.code.maven-play-plugin:maven-play-plugin:1.0.0-alpha1:add-module-app-resources

Description:

Adds dependent modules resources ('app' directories) to Play! application.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven 2.0 project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: generate-resources.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
playHome File - The directory for the generated ZIP.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
compileApp boolean - ...
playId String - ...

Parameter Details

compileApp:

...
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${play.compileApp}

playHome:

The directory for the generated ZIP.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${playHome}

playId:

...
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
